review: The number of programs/apps that the chromecast is compatible with is rather lacking.  I only chromecast compatible programs regularly use are netflix and youtube.  Unfortunately, both also are available as apps for my TV, so the chromecast is pretty redundant.  If they were able to add more compatibility from sites that stream, the utility would skyrocket.  As of now though, it's just a novelty item to be able take a youtube video from my phone and move it to my TV.

author: Brent A. Moulds

review: The Chromecast is an absolute steal.  For 35 dollars you can essentially turn any TV with an hdmi port into a smart tv.  The Chromecast allows you to stream from virtually any device (android/apple phones & tablets, any computer with google chrome).  For most modern TVs the chromecast will power itself by plugging into a USB on the back of the TV for power.  If your TV doesn't have a USB port then you can still easily plug it into the wall for power.  It's extremely easy to setup and I had mine up and running in under five minutes.We use it all the time for everything from watching movies on netflix, renting movies from google, listening to music on pandora and watching videos on youtube.  I never realized how much we would use the youtube feature, but we have a young son and my wife loves being able to play educational videos and songs for him easily on youtube.  The chromecast is also great for parties because i'm easily able to play songs and videos from my phone anywhere in the house without having to mess around with the TV. One of my favorite features is how it will automatically switch inputs to the chromecast as soon as you start casting from your device without needing to manually switch the input on the TV. If I'm sitting at the computer and I want to play a video for my son I can simply cast it from the computer and the TV will switch the input to the chromecast without me having to get up.The chromecast already supports a lot of great apps and with the recent release of the SDK it is now available for all developers to implement into their apps.  I expect most of the major apps to have chromecast implemented in the near future which will give it even more function and use.  I would highly recommend this device.
